projectGridLines.title: Integrated Platform Enhancement Project: Software Development
projectGridLines.description:
Description: BugBase is a continuous vulnerability assessment platform. It is a managed marketplace

of bounty hunters that facilitates startups and enterprises in hosting and managing bug bounty programs

and helps organizations continuously identify, manage, and mitigate real security vulnerabilities by

plugging into Bug Bounty and pen-testing programs.

We are looking for Full-Stack Developer interns, preferably dual-degree students with a Master's in

Sciences and a Bachelor's in Engineering, having a possibility of continuing this internship for the

further semester as a part of the dual-PS2 procedure.

Responsibilities:

Your role would be to build new features and improve the website.

Introducing best coding practices, which include frontend and backend technologies in web

applications.

Improving code quality and implementing new features in the application

Collaborate with the technical team to upkeep and enhance BugBase's website.

Skillsets: Nextjs, Reactjs, Javascript + Typescript, CSS, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Mongoose +

Knowledge of Web Fundamentals, Browser Workings, REST API, Docker, Creativity and Innovation,

Collaboration and Teamwork, Adaptability and Flexibility, Attention to Detail, Time Management and

Organization.

Additional Plus points: Orchestration using Docker, Docker Compose, Self Deployments of full-stack

applications
